metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/
aws::graph::propositions: Financial Data with Foreign Exchange Impact Analysis
Operating expenses for the current period were $537,933 million.
Operating expenses adjusted for foreign exchange rate changes were $538,464 million.
Operating expenses for the comparable period were $569,366 million.
Operating expenses for the comparable period adjusted for foreign exchange rate changes were $571,832 million.
Operating income for the current period was $36,852 million.
Operating income adjusted for foreign exchange rate changes was $36,392 million.
Operating income for the comparable period was $68,593 million.
Operating income for the comparable period adjusted for foreign exchange rate changes was $68,462 million.
Foreign exchange rate changes resulted in a $531 million increase in operating expenses for the current period.
Foreign exchange rate changes resulted in a $2,466 million increase in operating expenses for the comparable period.
Foreign exchange rate changes resulted in a $460 million decrease in operating income for the current period.
Foreign exchange rate changes resulted in a $131 million decrease in operating income for the comparable period.
The foreign exchange impact represents the change in reported amounts resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates from those in effect in the comparable prior year period.
The constant currency amounts represent the outcome that would have resulted had foreign exchange rates in the reported period been the same as those in effect in the comparable prior year period.
